author: Thong Nguyen
comment: Man, got this when it first came out in 2014, left Android Wear and now back.  Dude, the app improved so much. Keep up the good work.

author: Christopher Vella
comment: Very happy with the purchase. All components are well polished and all basic functionality is covered. You wont be disappointed.

author: Tran Sient
comment: Fantastic! Exactly what I was looking for! :) Great visuals, love it! 🤣

author: Constance Woerner
comment: Fun and works gr8

author: Robert Biediger
comment: Audio visualization for the watch!!!  Great options, and excellent execution.  I'm purchasing this right now!  This gets people's attention just about anywhere! Especially in bars, clubs, and parties!
title: SOLD!!!

author: David Bowie
comment: I bought the app within minutes of using the demo version i loved it that much thanks.
title: I love the app

author: Garrett Robertson
comment: Great visualizations, exactly what I was looking for. Perfect for dance parties.
title: Wow

author: Caleb Crook
comment: But doesn't sense the music well

reply.author: AQ
reply.content:
Hi Caleb, we pushed a new update and hope it is much better for you now.
If your issue still persists, we would be glad if you can provide more details so we can try to fix it, thanks!

title: It looks cool

author: Peter Gallacher
comment: There are so many visualisations to choose from and the performance of the visualiser is solid, easily achieving 60ps when set. You can also control many other options such as the anti aliasing, color settings and microphone sensitivity. Latest update has added a few new visualisations and made the watch interactions much better too.

reply.author: AQ
reply.content: Thanks Peter, I just pushed a major update which hopefully fixes this issue for you.

title: The best visualisation app for Wear devices I've used.

author: Ray Wright
comment: Great app regularly updated by the developer. Well worth buying.
title: Good reason to own a smart watch

author: Lui Yay
comment: Just awesome
title: Awesome

author: L. O.
comment: If you want to turn your wrist into a psychedelic universe that grooves to the beat, then this mofo is a must have!  I'll be setting my watch to full brightness and blinding people with its awesomeness at raves and music festivals.
title: Melted my space time continuum

author: Ruby Nguyen
comment: A very fun and cool app. It comes with many different visualizers and I hope the developers continue to add new ones!
title: Tons of fun

author: Andy Pham
comment: This visualizer is a fun addition to parties and nights out in the clurrrrb! Would love to see more options!
title: Great party pleaser!

author: Dave Picton
comment: Best visualiser app for wear

reply.author: AQ
reply.content: Thanks for reporting, preparing a nice update with a companion app at the moment. Could you tell me which renderer numbers are impacted please, so I can investigate and hopefully fix it with next update.

title: Great app,

author: Toye Johnson
comment: The best hands down sound visualizer on the market,  with tons of different  visuals to choose from
title: Awsome

author: Justin Lee
comment: Very fun to have.
title: Great app

author: chip burke
comment: Awesome!

author: Ted Logan
comment: An excellent app that is always fun to use and show off. The only issue I have with this app is that the screen is somewhat squished vertically on a Moto 360, making circles appear oval. I'd prefer a mode that crops the visualisers at the bottom instead.
title: Spectacular App

author: Austin Haight
comment: This app is sick. You will want to go to a club just to show this off. It's really a blast. 42 different visualizations. Simply swipe to change sensitivity and visualization.
title: Worth much more than 99 cents

author: Wally Mahar
comment: Now make a live wallpaper version, so it matches my lgr, and you can get more money from me. stunning app

reply.author: AQ
reply.content: Thanks, good idea I will try to work on releasing a watch face of it.

title: WOW!

author: Callan Carr
comment: For some reason the latest update has made it really slow, please fix this. I have it on the highest frame rate settings (35FPS) and have tried numerous things like turning on Anti-alising but it's not helping me out.  Please do sort this out, one of my favourite wear apps, but kind of non-functional atm

reply.author: AQ
reply.content:
Thanks for the report, much appreciated, and will investigate ASAP. FYI, the latest update of Advanced Wear Visualizer dates from November 27, 2014. Check if you do not have an application or a watch face taking much of your CPU because that is probably the main cause. Try a reboot of the watch too. Thanks again!
EDIT: A new update has been pushed.

author: Barry Hemmons
comment: Excellent, excellent app. Wish I was still at the clubbing stage of my life so I could show it off every weekend. Still right at the top of the "look what cool things my watch can do" demo list. Well done.
title: Rhythmically Awesome

author: kinesivan
comment: A watchface version would be nice! A digital clock with a retro font like pixel font styles or something! When you wake it from ambient display, it can have color changing visualizer for the clock

reply.author: AQ
reply.content: Thank you Dennis. Yes I thought making a watch face of it, I need to be sure the microphone can be used properly without blocking "ok google", check the battery impact, and of course find the time to do it.

title: Love it, do you plan on incorporating a watchface?

author: David D. Stanton
comment: Wish it had time and battery hehe... But it'd probably eat my battery....
title: Great work!

author: Ian McCall
comment: No time display… just a bit of fun.
title: This app is brilliant.

author: Alex Atkin
comment: If only the watches had bigger batteries

author: Gary Carter
comment: Amazing fun graphical stunning to see on a watch best in a dark room
title: Nothing like it

author: Niko Kruzel
comment: Great selection of themes no bloat exactly as described! Great job
title: Awesome

author: Frantz Gilbert
comment: So accurate. One of my favorite apps. Great job on this one.
title: Wow

author: Clayton Bigsby
comment: Legit!!!!

author: Otis Spud
comment: Great way to show off android wear

author: Daniel Cowen
comment: Worth the money.
title: Fun app.

author: Serge Berig
comment: Fantastic job.
title: Love it.

author: Pietro Mattu
comment: !Geek!   :-)
title: Top

author: Terren Ng
comment: Love it

author: Chad Dierkes
comment: But it is so cool to geek out with. So many different visualizations. I definitely thought this would be a 15 minute refund, but it worked so well i decided to keep it.
title: Completely unnecessary

author: Troy Blackford
comment: Must have interactive bling for Wear owners. Fun as heck, slick as can be. Proud to have this on my wrist.
title: Awesome

comment: Super dumb and loving every minute of it.

author: Iain Searcy
comment: I was humming and singing into it for over 15 minutes.  swipe right and left to change styles and up and down for the sensitivity levels.  Thanks for the best rave watch around... now to go to my first rave.
title: Brilliant audio visualizer.
